00019 extern process_t* get_current_process();
00020 
00021 //The kernel callback for a keyboard event
00022 //Registered with the kernel input manager in void post_init(); with a register_input_listener(DEVICE_KEYBOARD) call
00023 void kernelInputCallback(uint32 device, uint32 main, void* additional)
00024 {
00025 
00026         //Create a new message to send to the all processes
00027         process_message da;
00028 
00029         //Initialize the message and set the data
00030         memset(&da, 0, sizeof(process_message));
00031         da.ID = INPUT_MESSAGE;
00032         da.message_data[0] = device;
00033         da.message_data[1] = main;
00034         da.message_data[2] = *((MEM_LOC*)additional);
00035 
00036         //Tell the scheduler to send the message to all processes with the INPUT_BIT flag set
00037         scheduler_global_message(da, INPUT_BIT);
00038 }
00039 
00040 void kernelMouseCallback(uint32 device, uint32 main, void* additional)
00041 {
00042 
00043         //Create a new message to send to the all processes
00044         process_message da;
00045 
00046         //Initialize the message and set the data
00047         memset(&da, 0, sizeof(process_message));
00048         da.ID = INPUT_MESSAGE;
00049         da.message_data[0] = device;
00050 
00051         //Convert the message data to a fixed size message for the mouse callback
00052         mouse_input_t* message_data = additional;
00053         da.message_data[1] = message_data->i_byte;
00054         da.message_data[2] = message_data->mouse_x;
00055         da.message_data[3] = message_data->mouse_y;
00056 
00057         printf("%i %i %i\n", message_data->i_byte, message_data->mouse_x, message_data->mouse_y);
00058 
00059         //Tell the scheduler to send the message to all processes with the INPUT_BIT flag set
00060         scheduler_global_message(da, INPUT_BIT);
00061 }
00062 
00063 //External links to the kernel page directory and kernel heap
00064 extern page_directory_t* kernel_pagedir;
00065 extern heap_t kernel_heap;
00066 
00067 int alive = 0;
00068 
00069 void postInitialization() 
00070 {
00071     registerInputListener(DEVICE_KEYBOARD, &kernelInputCallback);
00072     registerInputListener(DEVICE_MOUSE, &kernelMouseCallback);
00073 
00074     createNewProcess("./system/root/Line", init_vfs());
00075 
00076     //Rename the idle process
00077     set_process_name(get_current_process(), "System Idle");
00078     scheduler_block_me();
00079 
00080     enable_interrupts();
00081 
00082     //Loop and continually halt the processor, this will cause the processor to idle between interrupts
00083     for (;;) { 
00084 
00085         if (scheduler_num_processes() == 1)
00086         {
00087                 printf("Creating new instance of Line\n");
00088                 createNewProcess("./system/root/Line", init_vfs());
00089                 enable_interrupts();
00090         }
00091 
00092         asm volatile("hlt");
00093         scheduler_block_me();
00094     }
00095 }
